description: For a long run, you might need more stuff. This 7L race vest is designed to move with you, and give you access to what you need. Smart storage and durable hydration define this multi-adventure rig. It features a 2L bladder and adjustable side straps to keep the load moving with you.Designed for taller people or those who have a long torso.Includes 2L hydration reservoir with quick-release valve for easy cleaning.Bladder hose sternum attachment.Adjustable side straps and compression system create a comfortable and stable fit.Front storage for quick access to smartphone, nutrition and bottles.Comfortable mesh material wicks away sweat and water.Chafe-free soft touch binding.External daisy chain on back for attaching lighting or other essentials.Reflective hits for 360-degree visibility.Weight of pack and reservoir is 312g.
name: Nathan TrailMix Race Vest - Unisex
